messages.update:
This is the 1st Beta version for Mech & Magic on Minecraft Java Version 1.12.2!
We ask that you play as normal as possible to help find any bugs or issues.
If anything of concern is found please post it to our GitHub
Please use the link in the packs main menu to join our Discord and voice any concerns or suggestions!

WARNING!: This version should not be used to play existing 1.10.2 worlds.
This includes servers. Feel free to make 1.12.2 beta servers but you should not be using this version for stable community servers.
This is a test version and should be treated as such.

mods.name: Minecraft Forge
mods.description: It loads the things.

mods.name: Actually Additions
mods.description: Do you want Automation? Wireless Transport? Better Machines? A cup o' Coffee? Chests? Better Hoppers? Leaf Blowers? Faster Growth? Plants? Well, Actually Additions has all that and a lot more!

mods.name: Akashic Tome
mods.description: The book of books.

mods.name: Applied Energistics 2
mods.description: A Mod about Matter, Energy and using them to conquer the world..

mods.name: Astikoor
mods.description: Astikoor Mod

mods.name: Astral Sorcery
mods.description: Magic mod that draws power from stars and their constellations

mods.name: Baubles
mods.description: Adding a touch of bling to Minecraft

mods.name: Bed Bugs
mods.description: Adds a button and command to leave the bed/server when stuck!

mods.name: Better Builder's Wands
mods.description: Wands that allow placing of multiple blocks at a time

mods.name: Better Placement
mods.description: Syncs block placement to cursor movement, allowing easier and faster building.

mods.name: Botania
mods.description: Botania is a mod that adds nature magic to Minecraft. This time with a fancy number in front.

mods.name: Simple Camp Fire
mods.description: Adds a camp fire that cooks food. It even cooks while you sleep.

mods.name: Carry On
mods.description: Carry On is a simple mod that improves game interaction by allowing players to pick up, carry, and place single block Tile Entities using only their empty hands.

mods.name: Crop-Eating Animals
mods.description: Animals harvest crops by themself and start to make babies.

mods.name: ChickenChunks
mods.description: Advanced chunkloading management Credits: Sanguine - Texture Supporters:

mods.name: Chisel
mods.description: Adds in tons of fancy blocks for decoration, crafted using the Chisel.

mods.name: Chisels & Bits
mods.description: a mod about Sculpting, Decorating and Aesthetics

mods.name: Chococraft 3
mods.description: Chocobos in Minecraft

mods.name: Clay Bucket
mods.description: Adds a clay bucket for early game.

mods.name: Clock HUD
mods.description: A simple clock GUI to check the time.

mods.name: CoFH World
mods.description: Provides advanced and highly customizable world generation capabilities.

mods.name: Colossal Chests
mods.description: For when regular chests are too small

mods.name: CosmeticArmorReworked
mods.description: This mod allows you to wear two sets of armor, one for display, one for function. You can also hide armor for your skin. For PVP, you can stop the mod from functioning on your client side.

mods.name: CraftTweaker2
mods.description: Customize your minecraft experience!

mods.name: CTM
mods.description: Allows resource packs to add connected textures, emissive rendering, and much more.

mods.name: Custom Starter Gear
mods.description: Gives you full control over what items players start the game with.

mods.name: Cyclic
mods.description: Items, inventory features, world generation, simple machines, gameplay tweaks, new villagers, key bindings, and more. See config to disable absolutely anything. Report issues and suggestions to https://github.com/PrinceOfAmber/Cyclic/issues

mods.name: Bailey's Dailies
mods.description: Daily quests for hunting, gathering, and exploring the wonderful world of Minecraft.

mods.name: Dark Utilities
mods.description: A mod that adds a bunch of new utilities to the game.

mods.name: Draconic Evolution
mods.description: This is a mod that was originally made for the Tolkiencraft mod pack but it has since evolved way beyond that. This mod adds a lot of extremely expensive and powerful end game items as well as a lot of random useful bits and pieces.

mods.name: Embers
mods.description: Dwarven-style Magitech Mod

mods.name: Enderfuge
mods.description: Increased output from smelting vanilla armor/weapons.

mods.name: EnderStorage
mods.description: Stores your stuff in the END!

mods.name: Ender Utilities
mods.description: Some random, hopefully fun, and possibly even useful utilities (Modjam 4)

mods.name: EvilCraft
mods.description: An evil mod for Minecraft.

mods.name: Extra Rails
mods.description: Additional Minecart rails.

mods.name: Extra Utilities 2
mods.description: A bunch of useful things.

mods.name: Extreme Reactors
mods.description: Adds large, multiblock power generation machines to Minecraft. Compatible with Redstone Flux (RF) and Tesla power. This is a port of the 1.7.10 mod Big Reactors from ErogenousBeef

mods.name: Fast Leaf Decay
mods.description: Increases leaf decay rates. Check out the config to change the decay rate!

mods.name: Flexible Tools
mods.description: Tools with a bunch of upgrades and abilities.

mods.name: Friendly Fire
mods.description: Stop hurting your friends :'(

mods.name: Fuel Canister
mods.description: Adds the fuel canister which can be filled with coal and then used as fuel.

mods.name: Advanced Generators
mods.description: Freeform Multiblock generators that produce MJ, RF and EU

mods.name: Gravel Ores
mods.description: Simple gravel ores that appear on the surface.

mods.name: Harvest
mods.description: Right click crop harvesting

mods.name: Horse Power
mods.description: A mods that adds horse powered blocks.

mods.name: Immersive Engineering
mods.description: A retro-futuristic tech mod!

mods.name: Immersive Petroleum
mods.description: Adds oil and oil processing features to Immersive Engineering.

mods.name: Immersive Tech
mods.description: More tech for IE

mods.name: Industrial Foregoing
mods.description: A small reinvention of Minefactory Reloaded.

mods.name: Just Enough Items
mods.description: Simple recipe and item helper.

mods.name: JEI Integration
mods.description: JEI Integrations is the predecessor to NEI Integrations created by Tonius for Minecraft 1.7.10. It adds various tooltips, additional support for recipe handlers in Just Enough Items (JEI) and some various other features (Coming Soon...)

mods.name: Just Enough Resources
mods.description: Adds Resources and Mob Drops to JEI

mods.name: Less Forgiving Void
mods.description: Makes the void hate you a little more than Forgiving Void (and vice-versa).

mods.name: Mod Tweaker
mods.description: ModTweaker is an addon for CraftTweaker, a recipe manipulator utility for Minecraft. It allows you to modify the recipes of other mods that add their own crafting mechanics

mods.name: Morph-o-Tool
mods.description: The wrench to end all wrenches.

mods.name: NetherPortalFix
mods.description: Ensures correct destinations when travelling back and forth through Nether Portals in Multiplayer.

mods.name: OreGen
mods.description: One mod for generating ores used by most Tech-Mods.

mods.name: Psi
mods.description: Psionic Spellcasting Instruments

mods.name: QuantumStorage
mods.description: A mod that adds a Deep Storage Unit to hold all the things

mods.name: Quark
mods.description: Small things.

mods.name: Redstone Arsenal
mods.description: Behold the Redstone (Flux) Revolution - provides Flux-Infused Tools and Armor!

mods.name: Redstone Flux
mods.description: The Redstone Flux API - the cornerstone of Energy Transfer in modded Minecraft since 1.6.4.

mods.name: Reliquary
mods.description: Two words: magical swag. Oh, and a gun.

mods.name: RFTools
mods.description: RedFlux tools

mods.name: Roots 2
mods.description: Druidic magic mod.

mods.name: Rustic
mods.description: A Medieval Expansion Mod

mods.name: Scaling Health
mods.description: Extra health for players and/or mobs!

mods.name: Silent's Gems: Extra Parts
mods.description: Official tool part add-on pack for Silent's Gems

mods.name: Silent's Gems
mods.description: When diamonds won't cut it.

mods.name: Steve's Carts 2
mods.description: A carttastic mod adding a near infinite number of carts possible to the game, through the creation of modular carts.

mods.name: SwingThroughGrass
mods.description: Don't let the grass be between you and your prey!

mods.name: The One Probe
mods.description: A Probe to rule them all!

mods.name: Thermal Dynamics
mods.description: Thermal meets Dynamic - provides options for transporting items, fluids, and Redstone Flux!

mods.name: Thermal Expansion
mods.description: Expanding Minecraft Thermally - provides new options for automation and processing!

mods.name: Thermal Foundation
mods.description: The foundation of a Thermally enhanced world!

mods.name: Corail Tombstone
mods.description: Place a tombstone with the lost items when a player die, with features like decorative graves, auto-equip, key to access, wat...

mods.name: TorchMaster
mods.description: Adds a special torch which prevents mobs from spawning in a configurable range

mods.name: Tough As Nails
mods.description: Adds survival features to increase difficulty and realism, including thirst, body temperature, and more!

mods.name: Tough Expansion
mods.description: Adds RF-based items and blocks for use with the Tough As Nails mod

mods.name: TrashSlot
mods.description: Adds a trash slot to the inventory screen that allows deletion of unwanted items.

mods.name: UniDict
mods.description: a mod about unifying all the things.

mods.name: Useful Nullifiers
mods.description: Nullifiers to help get rid of all those items, fluids, and energy.

mods.name: Vampirism
mods.description: Adds vampirism features

mods.name: Veining
mods.description: Uncovers an ancient enchantment allows you to mine veins in a single swing.

mods.name: ViesCraft
mods.description: Airships through the eyes of Viesis!

mods.name: Villager Market
mods.description: A villager market mod.

mods.name: Waystones
mods.description: Teleport back to activated waystones. For Survival, Adventure or Servers.

mods.name: Whole Tree Axe
mods.description: New axe that harvests a tree with one click.

mods.name: XL Food Mod
mods.description: A mod that adds more foods and crops to the game.

mods.name: YABBA
mods.description: Yet Another Better Barrel Attempt

mods.name: Yummy
mods.description: More realistic food.

mods.name: *--Read Me--*
mods.description: Mods in RED maybe cause performance issues

mods.name: Bad Wither No Cookie! Reloaded
mods.description: A simple mod to silence the Wither and Dragon broadcast sounds.

mods.name: Blur
mods.description: Adds a blurry background when viewing GUIs

mods.name: Dynamic Lights
mods.description: portable and moving lightsources

mods.name: FoamFix
mods.description: Questionable "performance improvements" that are not in Forge for probably very good reasons.

mods.name: JourneyMap
mods.description: JourneyMap: Real-time map in-game or in a web browser as you explore. JourneyMap API: v1.12-1.4. Built: 2017-10-26-16:31:11.

mods.name: MoreOverlays
mods.description: Adds some overlays from NEI (Mob spawns, Chunk Bounds, Item Search)

mods.name: Optifine
mods.description: Optifine may help users with low end PCs have better performance. Optifine may HURT performance on higher quality PCs.

mods.name: Xaero's Minimap
mods.description: The most "vanilla-looking" minimap for Minecraft.

mods.name: AutoRegLib
mods.description: Automatically item, block, and model registration for mods.

mods.name: BD Lib
mods.description: A library of generic code for my other mods

mods.name: Bookshelf
mods.description: Bookshelf is a core/library mod, which adds new features and tools into the game for other content creators to work with. The primary focus of this project is to make use of the combined strength of the modded community to create wonderful tools that everyone can use.

mods.name: Brandon's Core
mods.description: This is the core mod that will be used by most of my mods from now on

mods.name: CodeChicken Lib
mods.description: CodeChickenLib is a library of systems to help make various aspects of minecraft modding easier. It contains libraries for 3D math and transformations, model rendering, packets, config, colours, asm and a few other things..

mods.name: CoFH Core

mods.name: Hammer Core

mods.name: LimeLib
mods.description: Library

mods.name: McJtyLib
mods.description: McJtyLib library for RFTools, Deep Resonance, ...

mods.name: MTLib
mods.description: Library files for Minetweaker Addons

mods.name: p455w0rd's Library

mods.name: Reborn Core
mods.description: Reborn Core is a library used for many of the Tech Reborn team's mods, including Tech Reborn, Quantum Storage, Fluxed Redstone, Hardcore Map Reset, and many more.

mods.name: ShadowMC
mods.description: A library mod required for all my other mods.

mods.name: Silent Lib
mods.description: Shared library for SilentChaos512's mods.

mods.name: Tesla Core Lib

mods.description: Shared Code Library Used by (not)all WanionCane mods!

mods.description: Utility mod and multiblock API

mods.name: FTBLib
mods.description: FTBLib

mods.name: FTBUtilities
mods.description: FTBUtilities

mods.name: PackGuard
mods.description: Monitors the modpack for user modifications, and tells the user to not report any errors if anything has been changed!

mods.description: protects users from taking damage between when they login and they can start interacting with the world
